**DeinServerHost.de - Your Host for Minecraft & More**

Why should you choose us ?

DeinServerHost.de is a company which has been founded in 2013, with the goal to provide good quality servers for an affordable price. Initially we started with only minecraft gameservers and vps, but quickly expanded to teamspeak, dedicated servers and shared hosting. We were also one of the first authorized german companies to provide servers for the game "Rust" back in 2013 - 2014, when the server files were still not available to the public.

What Anti DDoS Solutions are available?

Currently we provide services with Voxility (up to 500Gbit/s) and Combahton (which some might know from KMS-Hosting).


**Homepage:** [https://deinserverhost.de](https://deinserverhost.de)

**Test IPs:** 31.214.240.40 (Voxility) 5.1.81.9 (Combahton)

Why two test IPs ? The Combahton Protection uses different uplinks and routing than the ones from voxility, which might result in lower pings to your location.
